ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: I wonder if our SS bracer will still stack... ... From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@clubgraves.com] Sent: May 30, 2001 9:36 AM To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
ygData.messageBody:
I wonder if our SS bracer will still stack...

-----Original Message-----
From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
Sent: May 30, 2001 9:36 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Patch Message


Why does this make my blood run cold?
** Spell and Song Changes and Bug Fixes **

- We've been fixing holes in the spell stacking code. For the most part the
changes fix bugs that allowed tricks to get spells to stack that were never
intended to stack.

On the other hand, this is nice although I don't charm as much as I used to.

- Increased duration on Bard Charm songs to 18 seconds from 12 seconds.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Venator Sapentia, Xegony

with the subject submissions.
